clinical_study.brief_title: Online Chronic Pain Therapy for Adults
clinical_study.official_title: Online Chronic Pain Therapy for Adults

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the usefulness of an online, self-directed treatment for chronic pain that has been designed specifically for individuals who are currently or have previously served in the military.

detailed_description.textblock: This study will evaluate the efficacy of an eight-module, online, self-directed treatment for chronic pain using Acceptance-Based Behavioural Therapy (ABBT) as the treatment modality. The online modules are tailored to the unique issues of individuals with a military background. The modules will be delivered via the WebCAPSI Therapy program, an online, password-protected program that allows participants to anonymously progress through all modules at their own pace. ABBT modules cover the following: Introduction, Acceptance, Values, Cognitive Defusion, Mindfulness, Exercise/Pacing/Communication Skills, Self-as-Context, and Willingness. Modules encourage understanding of the information through audio files, military-specific vignettes, written materials, and homework exercises. Modules are designed to be completed in 60 minutes or less. Participants will have access to the online treatment for a three month period and will be encouraged to complete one module per week.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in McGill Pain Questionnaire - Short Form
primary_outcome.description: A brief self-report questionnaire that measures sensory and affective components of clinical pain.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Chronic Pain Acceptance Questionnaire - Revised
primary_outcome.description: A 20-item measure of acceptance of chronic pain with items scored from "0 = Never true" to "6 = Always true".

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Pain Catastrophizing Scale
primary_outcome.description: One of the most widely used instruments for measuring catastrophic thinking related to pain. A 13-item measure with items rated from "0 = Not at all" to "4 = All the time."

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Tampa Scale for Kinesiophobia
primary_outcome.description: A self-report measure of fear of movement and/or re-injury. 17 items rated from "1 = strongly disagree" to "4 = strongly agree"

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index
primary_outcome.description: A self-rated questionnaire which assesses sleep quality and disturbances over a 1-month time interval

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At completion of module, approximately 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: An eight item questionnaire regarding client satisfaction with the treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Beck Depression Inventory - Second Edition
secondary_outcome.description: A 21 item self-report measure of severity of depressive symptoms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Beck Anxiety Inventory
secondary_outcome.description: A 21-item self-report measure assessing severity of symptoms of anxiety

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in PTSD Checklist - Military Version
secondary_outcome.description: A 17-item self-report measure assessing severity of PTSD symptoms related to stressful military experiences.

arm_group.description: This is an open-label pilot study with no control group. Participants pre-treatment scores are compared to their post-treatment scores.

intervention.intervention_name: Online ABBT for Chronic Pain in Military
intervention.description: Participants will complete an 8-module, self-paced, online program for chronic pain using Acceptance-Based Behavioural Therapy (ABBT) as the therapeutic modality.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Chronic pain condition of duration 6 months or longer
- Patient at OSI Clinic in Winnipeg
- Access to a computer with internet at least once per week for 60 minutes
Exclusion Criteria:
- Active psychosis
- Actively suicidal
- Unstable living conditions
- Seriously impaired concentration
- Inability to read and write in English
